resources.string: Health and wellness research powered by you!

Thanks for your interest in joining us in leading-edge research about how food, supplements, and drugs may affect you and your health and well-being. Your contributions provide you insight into how what you use or consume affects you, but you also contribute to determining optimal use for people like you.

You have chosen to delete your ValidCare Study account. This will result in automatic withdrawal from all studies.\n\nBelow is a list of studies that you are a part of and information on how your response data will be handled with each after you withdraw. Please review and confirm.
Are you sure you wish to permanently delete your ValidCare Study account? You will need to register again if you wish to join a study.
It\'s been a while since you\'ve contributed. Please consider continuing your participation in important studies in which you\'re enrolled.
